column3: Nigen is worried about yet another family member.
Find Nigen's sister and slay any enemies that appear.
Allow me to thank you once again for helping my brother. Would you be able to aid my sister as well? Our family is somewhat troubled...
The gods told her to go and gather water from the river to the west. However, many beasts lurk in the area. I worry she will be set upon as my brother was.
Yet again I am unable to accompany her as the elder gods have given me my own work.
Could I ask you to check on her in my stead? She should still be gathering water to the west.
Please check on my sister in my stead. She should still be gathering water to the west.
Thank you so much, kind stranger. I am in your debt.
Tell me, have you heard of this river before? Its water is said to have healing properties─one drink and all your ailments shall be gone!
I imagine that someone in the village is going to fall sick shortly. That is surely why the gods bid me to gather water from the river.
Did you find my sister? She is still yet to return.
Thank you for your help. My sister is returned at last.
It seems you have influenced my siblings quite profoundly. They too have decided to become adventurers!
No doubt the elder gods foresaw this when they sent them out on their errands. I am most excited to hear of their adventures in the future.
